defaultParameters.description: ID of the Map Object that will become the waterfall. -1 is self
defaultParameters.name: id

defaultParameters.description: Diameter of the waterfall, in squares
defaultParameters.name: diameter

defaultParameters.description: Height of the waterfall, in squares
defaultParameters.name: height

defaultParameters.description: Shape of the waterfall. 1 = cylinder; 2 = box; 3 = sphere; 4 = plane
defaultParameters.name: shape

defaultParameters.description: Dark color to mix to the waterfall
defaultParameters.name: darkColor01

defaultParameters.description: Dark color to mix to the waterfall
defaultParameters.name: darkColor02

defaultParameters.description: Light color to mix to the waterfall
defaultParameters.name: lightColor01

defaultParameters.description: Light color to mix to the waterfall
defaultParameters.name: lightColor02

defaultParameters.description: Color of the waterfall's foam at the bottom
defaultParameters.name: foamColor

defaultParameters.description: Whether to add foam or not
defaultParameters.name: addFoam

commands.description: Turn a Map Object into a waterfall (will replace its graphics)
commands.name: Create waterfall
